title: IBM Named an AI Text Analytics Leader in two 2020 Forrester Wave™ Reports
excerpt: I’m thrilled to announce that IBM’s Watson Discovery was named a ‘Leader’ in two reports from Forrester in Q2 2020. Compared to other vendors, Watson Discovery received the highest score for strategy and for market presence in both reports: “The Forrester Wave™: AI-Based Text Analytics Platforms (Document-Focused),
